title: How to Make a Vegetable and Cheese Sandwich

steps.headline: Put a slice of bread on a plate
Add the onions, tomato, cucumber, bell pepper, jalapeños
Top them with your cheese as much as you like
Cover the topped slice with another slice of bread
Grill it or use a toasted sandwich maker.
Take them when golden brown shade appears.
Serve it hot with tomato sauce.

text: Put a slice of bread on a plate  Spread the sandwich spread evenly.  Add the onions, tomato, cucumber, bell pepper, jalapeños  Top them with your cheese as much as you like  Cover the topped slice with another slice of bread  Grill it or use a toasted sandwich maker.  Take them when golden brown shade appears.  Serve it hot with tomato sauce.  Finished.
